title: I BOUGHT TEEMO SKIN TWICE?
body: heyo guys. i like to Play teemo so ithought i could buy the new Little devil teemo. but as i bought it, somehow it bought it TWICE !!!! now i spent 2700rp for dat skin :c does anybody know what i can do now? xD

replies.body: It sounds really strange that this would happen, but after looking into it I can see the little mischief was up to no good!  Since this was an error with the store, I went ahead and refunded the difference of the double purchase.  Thanks for letting us know about this!
